meanings.definition: Surgical removal of the thyroid gland.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed a thyroidectomy on the patient to remove the diseased gland.
meanings.sent2: After the thyroidectomy, the patient needed to take medication to regulate their hormones.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor joked about having a pretend thyroidectomy, causing laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: The removal of the old tree felt like a thyroidectomy for the garden, changing its entire landscape.
meanings.sent5: The image of the surgeon delicately performing the thyroidectomy stayed vividly in my mind.
